caption: Group
description: The Group object represents a collection or association of entities, such as users, policies, or devices. It serves as a logical grouping mechanism to organize and manage entities with similar characteristics or permissions within a system or organization.
name: group

domain.description: The domain where the group is defined. For example: the LDAP or Active Directory domain.

type.description: The type of the group or account.
type.caption: Account Type

uid.description: The unique identifier of the group. For example, for Windows events this is the security identifier (SID) of the group.
